page.title: 18THE FIRE STATION
page.content: Bexleyheath Fire Station (Code E28), has 33 fire officers and one appliance. The men are divided into four watches, Red,Blue, Green, and White, plus one Divisional Officer. Each crew consists of a station officer, a leading fireman and 6 firemen. On each 999 call ther must be at least 5 crewmen. The Divisional Officer does not travel on the fire-engine but has his own vehicle. The most common call-out is to small domestic fires, mainly chip pans. The work is sad at times, but usually it is enjoyable.
